Mining.description: Extract rare minerals from an asteroid belt in a hostile system.
Secure a mining operation on a contested moon.
Mining.goal: Protect the miners until the operation is complete.

Mining.description: Retrieve precious metals from a hazardous asteroid field.
Mining.goal: Mine 30 units of precious metals without taking damage.

Mining.description: Harvest gas from a volatile gas giant.
Mining.goal: Collect 100 units of gas without triggering a flare.

Mining.description: Recover ancient mining equipment from a derelict station.
Mining.goal: Locate and retrieve 3 pieces of mining equipment.

Diplomacy.description: Negotiate a ceasefire between two warring factions.
Deliver a message of peace to a hostile faction.
Diplomacy.goal: Navigate to the hostile system and deliver the message safely.

Diplomacy.description: Mediate a trade dispute in a busy starport.
Diplomacy.goal: Resolve the dispute to the satisfaction of both parties.

Diplomacy.description: Escort an ambassador to a neutral space station.
Secure a trade agreement with an independent colony.
Diplomacy.goal: Negotiate favorable terms with the colony leaders.

Exploration.description: Chart a new route through an uncharted nebula.
Exploration.goal: Successfully map the nebula without getting lost.

Exploration.description: Investigate a mysterious signal from deep space.
Exploration.goal: Locate the source of the signal and report back.

Exploration.description: Explore a recently discovered rogue planet.
Exploration.goal: Survey the planet and collect data on its environment.

Exploration.description: Scan an unexplored asteroid field for valuable resources.
Exploration.goal: Complete a full scan and identify key resource nodes.

Exploration.description: Map the orbit of a newly formed binary star system.
Exploration.goal: Gather data on the star's orbits and potential for planets.

Research.description: Collect biological samples from an alien jungle planet.
Research.goal: Retrieve 10 samples and return them to the research station.

Research.description: Assist in the calibration of a deep space telescope.
Research.goal: Complete the calibration without damaging the equipment.

Research.description: Analyze the data from a recent supernova event.
Research.goal: Process and upload the data to the research network.

Research.description: Retrieve lost research data from a damaged satellite.
Research.goal: Recover the data and return it to the issuing faction.

Research.description: Conduct experiments on a low-gravity space station.
Research.goal: Complete the experiments without contaminating the samples.

Combat Operations.description: Eliminate a pirate fleet threatening a key trade route.
Combat Operations.goal: Destroy all pirate vessels in the area.

Combat Operations.description: Defend a mining colony from an incoming raid.
Combat Operations.goal: Repel all attackers and protect the colony.

Combat Operations.description: Intercept and capture a fugitive vessel on the run.
Combat Operations.goal: Disable the fugitive ship without destroying it.

Combat Operations.description: Engage a hostile alien species in a contested system.
Combat Operations.goal: Secure the system by neutralizing the alien threat.

Combat Operations.description: Escort a convoy through a war-torn region of space.
Combat Operations.goal: Ensure the convoy reaches its destination intact.

Archeology.description: Investigate ancient ruins on a desert planet.
Archeology.goal: Uncover the secrets hidden within the ruins.

Archeology.description: Recover artifacts from a crashed alien ship.
Archeology.goal: Retrieve 5 artifacts and return them to the issuing faction.

Archeology.description: Translate inscriptions found on an ancient monolith.
Archeology.goal: Successfully decode the message and report your findings.

Archeology.description: Locate and study a lost temple on a jungle moon.
Archeology.goal: Survey the temple and catalog its contents.

Archeology.description: Secure a dig site on a contested world filled with ancient relics.
Archeology.goal: Protect the archaeologists and their findings from raiders.
